data.name: Tactical Carrier
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
Includes Captain's controls and 4th bridge terminal by Mr Scoot.
Also adds a 4-cell laser-missile VLS if used with Revolution 1.3.11+ Provides the auto-barge slot for use with Resupply+ and Revolution 1.4+
Adds a chill out room downstairs for the crew to relax between sorties.
